review_title: Great place to work.. For a few months. They do not treat long term employees well
job_title: RN Case Manager in Tam Kỳ
pros: The patients were great most of the time. Usually can schedule patients to suit yourself so if you need to go to the dr you can
cons: Per visit employees can't say no because scheduling and management harass them-- no appreciation and no help from management when there isn't enough help
